005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public interface IBase64BinaryItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
016
017  /**
018   * Construct a new base64 encoded byte sequence item using the provided string
019   * {@code value}.
020   *
021   * @param value
022   *          a string representing base64 encoded data
023   * @return the new item
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  static IBase64BinaryItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
027    return cast(IStringItem.valueOf(value));
028  }
029
030  /**
031   * Construct a new URI base64 encoded byte sequence using the provided
032   * {@link ByteBuffer} {@code value}.
033   *
034   * @param value
035   *          a byte buffer
036   * @return the new item
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  static IBase64BinaryItem valueOf(@NonNull ByteBuffer value) {
040    return new Base64BinaryItemImpl(value);
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
045   *
046   * @param item
047   *          the item to cast
048   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
049   *         cast to this type
050   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
051   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  static IBase64BinaryItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
055    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BASE64.cast(item);
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  default IBase64BinaryItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
060    return cast(item);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Get the "wrapped" byte buffer value.
065   *
066   * @return the underlying byte buffer value
067   */
068  @NonNull
069  ByteBuffer asByteBuffer();
070
071  @Override
072  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
073    return compareTo(cast(item));
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Compares this value with the argument.
078   *
079   * @param item
080   *          the item to compare with this value
081   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
082   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
083   */
084  default int compareTo(@NonNull IBase64BinaryItem item) {
085    return asByteBuffer().compareTo(item.asByteBuffer());
086  }
087}
